long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Name: WooCommerce Product Scraper

Short Description:
A powerful tool to scrape and export WooCommerce product data with an intuitive Material Design interface.

Detailed Description:
WooCommerce Product Scraper is a professional-grade tool designed to help e-commerce managers, developers, and store owners easily extract product information from WooCommerce stores. With its modern Material Design interface, the extension offers a seamless experience for collecting and exporting product data.

Key Features:
• Easy Product Scraping: Quickly gather product information with a single click
• Batch Export: Select multiple products and export them at once
• Advanced Filtering: Filter products by price, stock status, and other attributes
• Smart Search: Search across product titles, SKUs, and descriptions
• Collection Support: Scrape and manage product collections
• Custom Export Fields: Choose which product data fields to export
• Material Design UI: Clean, modern interface for better usability

Perfect for:
• E-commerce managers needing product data backups
• Developers migrating between platforms
• Store owners tracking inventory
• Market researchers analyzing product data

Privacy & Security:
• Works only on active tab when activated
• No data collection or tracking
• Local storage for temporary data only
• Secure, permission-based operation

Category: Shopping
Language: English
